Title: Healer
Important Commands: Apply, Unbandage, Mix
Syntax: "Apply my bandage", "Unbandage", "Add"
As a Healer, you have the ability to treat wounds, aid with cures, and tend to people's well-being and physical health.
To look at a person's injury type $(udat.chatchar)LOOK [PERSON]'S INJURY. To bandage an injured party: $(udat.chatchar)APPLY [BANDAGE] TO [PERSON]'S [BODY PART]. To remove a bandage from someone: $(udat.chatchar)UNBANDAGE [PERSON].
Bandages will generally gain an unsightly appearance when they need to be changed. Pay attention for that, and then repeat the process above.
There are also ointments in game that you can purchase, such as burn ointment, cleansing ointment, sleeping drugs, and pain relief drugs.
You can also create cures by mixing certain items together. For example, to make the zombie cure, you can $(udat.chatchar)ADD [BASIL LEAF] TO [HOLY WATER FLASK]. Talk to other Healers in game to see what your current options are.
